about_the_game:
Nightmare in Cookie Town

Welcome to Cookie Town, a once bustling and cheerful place now shrouded in darkness and despair. In "Nightmare in Cookie Town," you find yourself in an abandoned town where an unspeakable horror lurks in the shadows. there is a creature twisted by darkness, driven by an insatiable hunger and an insidious desire to eat.

Gameplay:
Explore the sprawling, eerie landscape of Cookie Town, from decaying bakeries to deserted streets.
Equipped with your Grappling Spatula and the eerie guidance of your cursed Cookie Compass, you’ll navigate the twisted, shadowy alleys of Cookie Town with unsettling ease, never knowing what might be lurking around the corner...

Your objective:
survive and uncover the dark secrets that transformed this once joyous town into a nightmarish trap.
Inspired by the gameplay of "Slenderman," you must avoid the relentless pursuit of the monster while collecting crucial items and solving puzzles to find the truth.
